item.title: R-visualization-of-epidemic-in-United-States
item.description: Epidemic in United States On the another side of the world, however, the disease has rapidly transmitted through the world, especailly United States. As compare to China, it does not implement lockdown and social distancing policy at the early stage of the epidemic. But it’s true that, US’s mass screening and medical system performance has shown the its amazing health-care resources, which is shown in my previous assignment.
